compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Utilities, Professional services
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Business expenses related to workers completing their job will usually be tax exempt
All expenses that has been approved by the client as a business expense will be NET to the employee (grossed up if not tax free)
Maximum €0.42 per betrieblich gefahrenen kilometer, maximum €12,600 per year steuerfrei. Parking tickets taxed if paid outside of Mileage payment
Lodging should be paid separately upon receiving the proper invoice/receipt or €15 without a receipt. With proper receipt can be reimbursed in full tax-free

Domestic: maximum €26.40 per day tax-free (12 hours maximum). If meals provided by employer/host, per diem reduced by 50%. International: government per diem rates apply, daily rate may be increased but receipt required for amount above set rate to be tax-exempt
Other expenses are subject to varying tax rules. All approved expenses will be NET to employee (grossed up) if not tax free

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Training expenses require the approval of the direct manager

Travel reporting template must be submitted. Map with the relevant route (google maps is sufficient) required. Voraussetzung für die steuerfreie Behandlung der Kilometergelder ist die genaue fortlaufende Führung eines Fahrtenbuches oder eines anderen gleichwertigen Nachweises
Travel expenses must be submitted using the travel report template

Domestic business trips: per diem entitlement for workers who travel more than 25 kilometres from their place of business. Per diem method cannot be mixed with actual expenses - need to agree with worker on one method per business trip

International business trips: per diem method cannot be mixed with actual expenses - need to agree with worker on one method per business trip. If lunch and dinner are provided on trip, per diem allowance reduced by two thirds
International travel: can choose to pay worker the per diem rate in advance of the trip or upon their return
